name: Plus AI Presentations API
tagline: Create professional presentations with the Plus AI API
description: Create professional PowerPoint presentations using the Plus AI API, and embed presentations in your apps and workflows. The Plus AI API generates native PPTX files and supports custom templates and advanced slide elements like charts and images.

name: shadcn CLI 3.0 and MCP Server
tagline: One command line to add UI components to your project
description: shadcn/ui is the foundation for your design systemâ€”A set of beautifully designed components that you can customize, extend, and build on. Use the shadcn CLI to add UI components to your project. Start here: npx shadcn@latest init

name: LangLime
tagline: A language learning app that doesnâ€™t actually suck
description: Dear Duolingo, I'm fed up of spending weeks learning how to order "un caffÃ¨ con latte". LangLime takes a self-guided approach to learning, helping you with your reading and writing by translating realistic snippets (with a few other bells and whistles).

name: Scaloom
tagline: Reddit Multi-Posting â€” Publish at once across Subreddits
description: Reach more people on Reddit with Subreddit Multi-Posting. Publish 1 post to multiple subreddits in one click, stay compliant with rules, and drive customers on autopilot with smart scheduling + AI replies.

name: Casio Moflin
tagline: AI pet that forms real emotional bonds
description: A calming presence. A quiet reassurance. Easing your stress and bringing you comfort when it matters most. Moflin responds, understands, and grows with you. Its support you can feel, whenever you need it.

name: Nothing Playground
tagline: Vibe-code your Nothing phone
description: Nothing Playground is an AI creator studio for personalizing your Nothing phone. Use simple prompts to build "Essential Apps" (mini-apps), create custom Glyph Toys, camera presets, and EQ profiles, then share them with the community.

name: Partisyn
tagline: Tag your setup, share your build.
description: Instagram-style tagging for PC setups. Upload your setup, tag components with blue dots, share one link. No more 'what keyboard is that?' comments.

name: Net30
tagline: AI to calculate the best payment method for invoices
description: Net30 analyzes your vendor invoices and automatically identifies the most profitable way to pay whether that's capturing early payment discounts, maximizing card rewards, or optimizing your cashflow. We turn your payables into a source of hidden savings.

name: Simple Photo Gallery
tagline: Beautiful photo galleries in 1 minute
description: Simple Photo Gallery is a free, open-source tool that turns your photo folders into beautiful web galleries. Structure your gallery into sections and add descriptions to tell your story. Itâ€™s blazing fast, mobile-friendly, and easy to self-host.

name: All Conferences
tagline: ProductHunt For Conferences
description: I was struggling to search for conferences that Crustdata should attend + exhibit at and couldn't find a one stop shop. I also wanted to read reviews of other conferences so I built a tool that allows you to do both.

name: FotoShare AI Photo editor
tagline: Turn your photos into stunning AI masterpieces
description: FotoShare lets anyone transform their photos into AI-edited art â€” from cinematic portraits to dreamy collages. Powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash image model. Reimagine your photos, explore styles, and get inspired by what others create.

name: Percent 1.0
tagline: Review anything
description: Percent is the fastest way to review anything. Review everything. History built in. Reviews evolve over time. Download Percent and start contributing today.

name: Product Hunt Vote Monitor
tagline: Product hunt vote monitor
description: Monitor Product Hunt votes and track vote curves over time; A browser extension for monitoring Product Hunt votes and tracking vote curves over time. Save your Time.

name: X Auto Reply Assistant-AI-powered
tagline: Engage smarter,not harder.Generate natural replies inSeconds
description: Tired of spending hours replying on X/Twitter? ðŸš€ Meet X Auto Reply Assistant, a Chrome Extension that helps you generate natural, context-aware, and authentic replies â€” in just seconds.

name: Visual Branding System v1.2
tagline: The AI Playbook for Brand-Perfect Images
description: Create stunning, consistent visuals with AI. Visual Branding System v1.2 gives you 20+ tested prompts, a bilingual guide (EN/PT-BR), and a complete strategy to build your visual identity across all platforms â€” from Instagram to LinkedIn.

name: Buildsheet
tagline: A simple, drag and drop cheatsheet builder
description: Build beautiful cheatsheets with markdown support, syntax highlighting, and drag-and-drop layout. Export to Markdown. Offline, with auto-save feature. No signup required.

name: Uber for laundry app
tagline: uber for laundry app
description: Build your own Uber for Laundry App to innovate your laundry services as per customer preferences. We provides you laundry booking app clone script to scale-up your revenue.

name: Forge Logbooks
tagline: Custom workout logbooks built for YOUR training program
description: Tired of generic logbooks that don't fit your program? ForgeLogbooks lets athletes create fully customized workout trackers in 5 minutes. Choose your layout, add YOUR exercises, track what matters. Download instantly or get premium printed versions shipped.

name: LinkHub - Ultimate Link-in-Bio Platform
tagline: Create bio pages, sell products,book appointments all in one
description: LinkHub is the ultimate link-in-bio platform for creators,influencers,and entrepreneurs.Build stunning bio pages with built-in ecommerce, booking system, analytics, lead capture, and QR codes.Everything you need to grow your online presence - all in one place.

name: Email-Signature Generator
tagline: Generate polished, clickable email signatures in seconds.
description: Fast, no-fuss email signature generator that helps you create beautiful, clickable, and responsive signatures in seconds. Just follow the guide and instantly get HTML + rich text versions you can plug into Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail, or any email client.
